title: Escaping the Coven: Becoming a Witch Book One
description: Hunting monsters is in Veronica’s blood, something she has been training to do her entire life. During her sister’s very first mission, Veronica is taken hostage by a coven of witches. In order to survive, she must become the thing she has been training to kill her whole life. All she can think about is going home, but will she be accepted when she gets there? Or will she be turned away, ostracized for saving herself? Dive back into the world of the Fairytale Hunters and discover Veronica’s story. How did she become what she did? How did she end up in Megan’s place? And who taught her how to use her magic?
author: Renee Marski
